description: Ensure HTML form controls expose an accessible name through labels or descriptors.
recommendation: Add an explicit <label> association or aria-label/aria-labelledby so assistive tech can announce the control. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.1,3.3.2,4.1.2)
algorithm: Scans form controls for accessible names via aria-label, aria-labelledby, associated label[for], or wrapping <label> (excluding hidden inputs).
algorithm_advanced: Scans input/select/textarea elements (excluding type=hidden) and verifies aria-label/labelledby, associated label[for], or wrapping <label>.
